(SourceFile 
  (PackageClause 
    (PackageIdentifier "main")) 
  (FunctionDeclaration 
    (Block 
      (Statement 
        (SimpleStatement 
          (ShortVarDeclaration 
            (ExpressionList 
              (Expression 
                (Identifier "x")) 
              (Expression 
                (Identifier "y"))) 
            (ExpressionList 
              (Expression 
                (IntLiteral "3")) 
              (Expression 
                (IntLiteral "4"))))))) 
    (Identifier "main") 
    (ParameterList)))
